entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
